thumb.title: お告げ Destiny 【BGM】
thumb.description: この音楽は、聴く人を暗い幻想の世界へと誘う怪しいメロディーを展開します。心に潜む不安が浮かび上がり、まるで異世界に迷い込んだかのような神秘的な体験を提供します。陰影のある音色が織りなす音景の中で、聴く人は不気味さと魅了の狭間を旅することができるでしょう。暗闇に潜む神秘的な雰囲気が全体を包み込み、聴く人の心に深い印象を残す音楽体験が待っています！ This music develops a monstrous melody that invites the listener into a world of dark fantasy. The uneasiness lurking in the mind comes to the surface, offering a mysterious experience as if one has wandered into another world. In the soundscape of shaded tones, listeners will be able to travel between the eerie and the mesmerizing. A mysterious atmosphere lurking in the darkness envelops the entire space, creating a musical experience that will leave a deep impression on the listener's mind! https://twitter.com/nojisuman2525 download https://nojimusic.base.shop https://www.motionelements.com/ja/artists/nojisuma https://patreon.com/NojiSuma?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link
